T1.VC_Inspire LIKE '%'+#WHERE_VC_Inspire#+'%'
T1.VC_BrandDesc LIKE '%'+#WHERE_VC_BrandDesc#+'%'

SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , T1.VC_ID , T1.VC_VIN , T1.VC_PlateNumber , T1.VC_Brand , T1.VC_Inspire , T1.VC_BrandDesc , T1.VC_Capacity , T1.VC_EngineType , T1.VC_Remark , T1.VC_IsValid , T1.VC_CreatedBy , T1.VC_CreatedTime , T1.VC_UpdatedBy , T1.VC_UpdatedTime , T1.VC_VersionNo FROM BS_VehicleInfo T1 WHERE T1.VC_IsValid = 1
T1.VC_VIN LIKE '%'+#WHERE_VC_VIN#+'%'
T1.VC_Brand LIKE '%'+#WHERE_VC_Brand#+'%'
